thread.title: Democrats Spar Over Gun Control, Wall Street Reform In First Debate
thread.title_full: Democrats Spar Over Gun Control, Wall Street Reform In First Debate

author: Mara Liasson
title: Democrats Spar Over Gun Control, Wall Street Reform In First Debate
text:
Democrats Spar Over Gun Control, Wall Street Reform In First Debate October 14, 2015 5:12 PM ET Twitter 
Audio for this story from All Things Considered will be available at approximately 7:00 p.m. ET. 
Hillary Clinton was able to maintain her status as frontrunner by leaning left of Bernie Sanders on gun control and to the right of him on socialism in the first Democratic debate of the 2016 race.
